text:
Dr, Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
ll}. Gregory Hall
Urbana,. Illinois
Dear Harry:
Regarding your September 18 memo
to Schwarzwalder, the in-school project
files have been shipped to Central
Michigan State University so that Lew
Rhodes could continue to administer
the project and tie together the loose
ends. He has been in frequent contact
with Gale Adkins, and it was deemed
best to have him continue.
Sincerely,
Japk McBride
\_Director of Television
and KUON-TV
JMcB:ss
